job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer, Totogi (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on the use of AI as a tool to enhance existing software development processes and productivity, rather than on the core development, fine-tuning, or deployment of AI models themselves. Phrases like 'AI as their co-pilot', 'elevating your coding skills', 'crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts', and 'Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes' indicate a focus on AI-assisted development rather than specialized AI engineering roles like ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. There is a lack of specific technical details regarding model building, training, or deployment of generative models, which are central to the GenAI Engineer profile. Similarly, while it mentions enhancing software development, it doesn't emphasize the data-driven predictive modeling aspects of an ML Engineer. The role seems more aligned with leveraging AI for productivity gains in a general software engineering context, fitting the 'Ambiguous' profile's criteria for roles primarily focused on the 'USE of AI tools to enhance productivity'.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'software development', 'feature development', 'coding skills', and 'enterprise software solutions', indicating a focus on building and enhancing software.
The role involves 'implementing AI from the ground up in projects', which implies integrating AI capabilities into software.
job_tasks.phrase: Implementing AI from the ground up in projects

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'problem-solving' as an area enhanced by AI implementation, a common aspect of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Crafting AI-generated summaries' suggests the use or creation of generative AI capabilities, which falls under modeling.
The role aims to 'upgrade your coding skills' and 'elevate our enterprise software solutions', indicating a focus on improving the software development process and output.
The objective is to 'elevate our enterprise software solutions', directly relating to the development and improvement of software products.
The description highlights 'improving software development processes', which is a core aspect of software engineering.
The role involves driving 'the integration of AI into our development process', which is a software engineering task.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive the integration of AI into our development process
